Description:
Explore how Microsoft 365 apps are evolving with both Copilot chat-first experiences and in-app Copilot experiences across Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook. This session highlights new capabilities in Copilot Chat and in the apps that change how people work in M365. Learn how these innovations are empowering M365 users through improved productivity and efficiency in their workflows.
